subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Shedding his power envy, Barry Bonds has whacked 399 home runs in the decade since the 1997 All-Star break, when Mark McGwire had 31 home runs and Ken Griffey Jr. had 30.
snippet: Shedding his power envy, Barry Bonds has whacked 399 home runs in the decade since the 1997 All-Star break, when Mark McGwire had 31 home runs and Ken Griffey Jr. had 30.
